column5: This is a perfect place for work or play. Pick up the key and make yourself at home. Apartment is separate from main house, very quiet. Walking distance to bus, rail, all freeways, 5 minute drive to downtown, 10 minutes to Galleria. Plush Queen size bed, tv with many cable channels, Wifi. Shower, no bath. Plenty of towels. Kitchenette with frig, microwave, toaster, toaster oven, Keurig. Mini ironing board and iron in the apartment, blow dryer.
column8: Perfect for Weekend Getaway or Business Trip
